channel.title: How do i run clients on Mac? (Mac User)
channel.description:
Hello! I'm wondering how i can run a RSPVS Client on a mac. I really like playing Private server as its fun and different, But the problem is that i can't get to play clients on Mac. Offcourse, theres Moparscape client, but that one doesn't show all items and crashes constantly in-game. So i really need help on how to convert it, or run it on Mac. As im also done coding my own server. :P Any help will be gifted. ;)
- MrPurple :cool:
